intro: Soldanella pindicola, commonly known as the Pindus sandwort, is a small, flowering plant native to the Pindus Mountains in Greece. Soldanella pindicola thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to the harsh, alpine conditions of its native habitat.
